articles.author: Kyle Orland
articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2: The Ars Technica review - Ars Technica
articles.description: Nintendo’s overdue upgrade is a strong contender, even amid competition from handheld PCs.

articles.title: Scientists Detect Unusual Airborne Toxin in the United States for the First Time - SciTechDaily
articles.description: University of Colorado Boulder researchers made the first-ever airborne detection of Medium Chain Chlorinated Paraffins (MCCPs) in the Western Hemisphere. Sometimes, scientific research feels a lot like solving a mystery. Scientists head into the field with a…
articles.content:
Researchers unexpectedly discovered toxic airborne pollutants in Oklahoma. The image above depicts a field in Oklahoma. Credit: Shutterstock
